categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Sark was a male Human who was a technician in the Imperial Military of the Sith Empire during the Cold War and Galactic War against the Galactic Republic, when he was stationed on Vaiken Spacedock.

Technician Sark appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as the Tatooine Equipment Commendations vendor on Vaiken Spacedock. He was later removed from the game along with the rest of the planetary Equipment Commendations vendors in Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015.
